SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.*, rownum as rnum FROM ( SELECT a.bo_no, a.bo_title , a.bo_category , b.comm_nm as bo_category_nm , a.bo_writer, a.bo_pass , a.bo_hit, a.bo_del_yn , a.bo_reg_date , a.bo_mod_date FROM free_board a , comm_code b WHERE a.bo_category = b.comm_cd
ORDER BY bo_no desc ) T1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{firstRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_board a WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.bo_no, a.bo_title , a.bo_category , b.comm_nm as bo_category_nm , a.bo_writer, a.bo_pass , a.bo_hit, a.bo_content , a.bo_reg_date , a.bo_mod_date FROM free_board a, comm_code b WHERE a.bo_category = b.comm_cd AND a.bo_no = #{boNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board(bo_no, bo_title, bo_category, bo_writer ,bo_pass, bo_content, bo_reg_date, bo_hit) VALUES (seq_free_board.NEXTVAL, #{boTitle}, #{boCategory},#{boWriter} ,#{boPass}, #{boContent}, SYSDATE, 0)
